actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulation, Business Opportunity, and Energy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Regulation, Business Opportunity, and Energy

official_title: To require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to include with regulations issued by that agency a statement of the anticipated effects of the regulations on small business.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to include with any regulations EPA issues a statement of their anticipated effects on small businesses.

titles.title: To require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to include with regulations issued by that agency a statement of the anticipated effects of the regulations on small business.
